author: Omkar Godbole
title: U.S Dollar to Slide Further This Summer, Bank of America Warns
description: Weakness in the U.S. dollar is widely seen as positive for dollar-denominated assets, such as bitcoin and gold.
content:
Bank of America has warned that the U.S. dollar could be in for a rough summer, having already dropped sharply this year.
The dollar index, which tracks the value of the U.S. dollar against major cu… [+1930 chars]
